channel.title: CVE Feed for mercurius-js -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for mercurius-js -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-43801|2024-08-04T04:03:08.899Z -- mercurius-js -- mercurius
item.description: Mercurius is a GraphQL adapter for Fastify. Any users from Mercurius@8.10.0 to 8.11.1 are subjected to a denial of service attack by sending a malformed JSON to `/graphql` unless they are using a custom error handler. The vulnerability has been fixed in https://github.com/mercurius-js/mercurius/pull/678 and shipped as v8.11.2. As a workaround users may use a custom error handler.
